thread.title: Metal Tiger goes for gold at Spanish project
thread.title_full: Metal Tiger goes for gold at Spanish project

title: Metal Tiger goes for gold at Spanish project
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 10, 2015, 11:20 BST - UK Markets close in 5 hrs 10 mins Metal Tiger goes for gold at Spanish project By Victoria Young | Sharecast – 5 minutes ago 9.33 +0.25 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - AIM listed Metal Tiger said it was going for gold as well as tungsten at its joint venture in Extremadura, Spain. Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) in the listed company were down 1.47% to 0.862p at 0824 BST. 
Metal Tiger said in an update it had spent half or €250,000 of the €500,000 it is required to spend this year as part of its deal with Logrosán . 
Chief executive Cameron Parry said the company remained "highly active" during the summer break and was planning for September. 
"The joint (NasdaqCM: JYNT - news ) venture's work post-summer will include drilling to identify further tungsten mineralisation, but also gold mineralisation in certain target areas," the company said in a statement.
